Topic.Title: How to block conversation with captured NPC

Posts.EditableText: So, I have been trying to find a way to stop players being able to talk to a captured NPC until the creatures that have captured them are killed, but I cant figure out how to go about that. Any ideas?
Posts.HTML: So, I have been trying to find a way to stop players being able to talk to a captured NPC until the creatures that have captured them are killed, but I cant figure out how to go about that. Any ideas?

Posts.EditableText: Okay, so I figured this one out. Set a flag on the captors when they die that states they are dead, then use a scrip and call on that flag to see if its set or not.
